mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Byron, D. J.; Dayton, Spencer; Wilson, Lewis
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 19 1862. By Telegraph from Phillipi 18 1862. Sir, it is of the utmost importance to us that you should be here on the twentieth 20th inst can you come dispatch us an answer. a Hack and military escort will await you at Webster in the morning of that day or at such other time previous as you will signify to us 44 Spencer Dayton, Lewis Wilson D.J. Byron 55Gr170pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Byron, D. J.; Dayton, Spencer; Wilson, Lewis
Philippi, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
